data.title: 2006 Drama Desk Awards Bestowed at LaGuardia Concert Hall
data.meta_description: The 2006 Drama Desk Awards, honoring the best of Broadway, Off-Broadway, and Off-Off-Broadway, were presented tonight in the concert hall at the LaGuardia High School for Music and Art and the Performing Arts. For the third consecutive year, Harvey Fierstein hosted the ceremony, which was webcast live by TheaterMania.com. Presenters included Harry Connick, Jr., Barbara
data.text:
The 2006 Drama Desk Awards, honoring the best of Broadway, Off-Broadway, and Off-Off-Broadway, were presented tonight in the concert hall at the LaGuardia High School for Music and Art and the Performing Arts. For the third consecutive year, Harvey Fierstein hosted the ceremony, which was webcast live by TheaterMania.com.

Presenters included Harry Connick, Jr., Barbara Cook, Paige Davis, Fran Drescher, Victor Garber, Deborah Gibson, Angela Lansbury, Cynthia Nixon, Kelli O’Hara, Patti LuPone, and Jonathan Pryce. The evening also featured performances of numbers from eight nominated musicals, including The Drowsy Chaperone, Grey Gardens, and Jersey Boys.

The ceremony was taped for television; it will be edited and broadcast as a two-hour special on WNET-TV on Monday, May 29 from 1pm to 3pm, and on PBS stations nationwide in June. (Check local listings for details). The show will also be telecast on Channel 25 in New York City on Tuesday, May 30 and Thursday, June 1 from 10pm to 12:30am.

Following is a complete list of the nominees, with the winners’ names in bold.

********************

Alan Bennett, The History Boys

David Hare, Stuff Happens

Warren Leight, No Foreigners Beyond this Point

Martin McDonagh, The Lieutenant of Inishmore

Terrence McNally, Dedication or The Stuff of Dreams
